QuestData.Title: Step Three: Prophet
QuestData.Description: All that yet stands between me and the temple is Prophet Jammal'an himself. He is the leader of the Atal'ai trolls here, a foul manipulator.$B$BKnow that you do not face a mere crazed troll, $n, but an instrument of forces beyond your darkest comprehension. Yet you do not fight alone; my strength and the will of the Green Dragonflight go with you.$B$BProceed to the Den of the Caller, left through the Hall of Ritual, and then down into the Hall of Bones. At the bottom, you will find Jammal'an.
QuestData.RewardText: He has escaped! I should have known it would not be so easy.$B$BThe path is clear, $n. It is time to return.
